kubernetes_persistent_volume_claim.description: This resource allows the user to request for and claim to a persistent volume.

metadata.description: Standard persistent volume claim's metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

spec.description: Spec defines the desired characteristics of a volume requested by a pod author. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#persistentvolumeclaims)

wait_until_bound.description: Whether to wait for the claim to reach `Bound` state (to find volume in which to claim the space)
